com.hf.live.stickygridheaders

类 StickyGridHeadersBaseAdapterWrapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.hf.live.stickygridheaders.StickyGridHeadersBaseAdapterWrapper
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class StickyGridHeadersBaseAdapterWrapper
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Adapter wrapper to insert extra views and otherwise hack around GridView to add sections and headers.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      protected class  StickyGridHeadersBaseAdapterWrapper.FillerView
      Simple view to fill space in grid view.
      protected class  StickyGridHeadersBaseAdapterWrapper.HeaderFillerView
      A view to hold the section header and measure the header row height correctly.
      protected class  StickyGridHeadersBaseAdapterWrapper.HeaderHolder 
      protected class  StickyGridHeadersBaseAdapterWrapper.Position

      • getCount

        public int getCount()

      • getItem

        public java.lang.Object getItem(int position)
                         throws java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
        Get the data item associated with the specified position in the data set.

        Since this wrapper inserts fake entries to fill out items grouped by header and also spaces to insert headers into some positions will return null.

        参数:
        position - Position of the item whose data we want within the adapter's data set.
        返回:
        The data at the specified position.
        抛出:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException
